price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye Mwenye ufalme wa mbingu na ardhi. Na siku itapo simama Saa ya Kiyama, siku hiyo wataangamia wenye kushikamana na upotovu.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ
footnotes: Na ni wa Mwenyezi Mungu pekee ufalme wa mbingu na ardhi, kwa kuumba, kumiliki, na kupanga. Na itapo fika Saa ya Kiyama, siku hiyo watakhasiri wenye kufuata upotovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'ṭilūna
